Ingredients.5: 1 (16 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate

Ingredients.7: 1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage

Directions.1: Steep tea in 2 cups boiling water for 10 minutes. Place remaining 3 cups boiling water in a 9x13 inch pan. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Stir in lemonade concentrate, orange juice concentrate, and brandy. Remove tea bags and stir tea into mixture. Freeze overnight.

Directions.2: To serve, scoop desired amount into glass, then fill glass with lemon-lime soda, and stir.
